Public Class XunitTestCollectionRunnerBaseContext(Of TTestCollection As {Class, IXunitTestCollection}, TTestCase As {Class, IXunitTestCase}) Inherits TestCollectionRunnerContext(Of TTestCollection, TTestCase) Implements IAsyncLifetime, IAsyncDisposable
